recipesJson.name: 1-2-3-4 Creme Brulee
recipesJson.author: altneurose
recipesJson.description: Easy peasy banana creme brulee inspired by Jimmy the Juice Man. Does absolutely not taste like actual creme brulee.

reviews.text: Really nice banana custard. I mix for a couple people and everyone enjoys this one. Also looking forward to trying other fruits on this custard base. Thanks for a great recipe!
